Episodes.Title: Day 6: 6:00 A.M. - 7:00 A.M.
Episodes.Plot: 20 months have passed since the events of Day Five. For the past 11 weeks, the U.S. has been under siege by a series of terrorist bombings, with Muslim extremists as the prime suspects. L.A. joins the list of casualties when a bus is bombed in a suicide attack. President Wayne Palmer is torn when he receives conflicting advice from his top advisors. Tom Lennox suggests that the government begin rounding up all Islamic-Americans for detention, but NSA Director Karen Hayes argues that it?s too dra
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Ruben Pla,  D.C. Douglas,  Kahlil Joseph,  Benito Paje,  Steven Schub,  Eric Bruskotter,  Raphael Sbarge,  Kal Penn,  Tzi Ma,  Megan Gallagher,  Michael Angarano

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 7:00 A.M. - 8:00 A.M.
Episodes.Plot: Jack tries to locate Assad in hopes of warning him about the impending air strike. Assad agrees to help Jack locate Fayed, but Jack worries that he?s forgotten how to do his job. Ahmed finds he must take drastic action when his role in the attacks is discovered. President Palmer?s sister, Sandra, goes a long way to defend her principles when she finds herself and her civil rights organization to be a target in an FBI investigation.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Michael Angarano,  Kal Penn,  Van Epperson,  Muttalib J. Ibrahim,  Patrick Sabongui,  Julie Quinn,  Hrach Titizian,  Herzl Tobey,  Alfred Woodley,  Adrian R'Mante,  Sammy  Sheik,  Eric Bruskotter,  Scott William

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 8:00 A.M. - 9:00 A.M.
Episodes.Plot: Assad uses clever tactics to manipulate Fayed?s agent into leading them to the place where Fayed may be hiding. Ahmed uses Ray?s family as leverage to force him to deliver a mysterious package. Fayed contacts Wayne with a demand, while Sandra bucks the FBI?s authority. Jack becomes concerned when Curtis begins to display hostility toward Assad.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Steven Schub,  Sammy  Sheik,  Bruce Gerard Brown Jr.,  Shaun Majumder,  Raphael Sbarge,  David Michael,  Jim Klock,  Pat Healy,  James Parks,  Scott William Winters,  Kal Penn,  Michael Angarano,  Megan Gallaghe

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 9:00 A.M. - 10:00 A.M.
Episodes.Plot: Ray uses the component to bargain for his family?s freedom, but Ahmed only grants half his wish. Chloe moderates an argument between Morris and Milo, while Walid overhears information in the detention center that may be of use to CTU. Wayne agrees to pardon Assad in the face of his efforts to aid Jack; a gesture that does not sit well with an enraged Curtis. Jack follows a lead given to the police by Jillian, but his information comes too late to stop Fayed from launching another deadly strike.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Michael Angarano,  Ajay Mehta,  Shaun Majumder,  Steven Schub,  Raphael Sbarge,  Megan Gallagher,  Kal Penn,  David Michael,  Al Faris

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 10:00 A.M. - 11:00 A.M.
Episodes.Plot: Wayne prepares to talk to the nation as L.A. deals with the fall-out from the nuclear blast. Fayed tries to set up a deal with a new trigger man who can help with the four remaining bombs. Sandra is outraged when the FBI forces Walid to wear a wire in the hopes of gaining information from his fellow inmates. Assad provides CTU with a lead, but Jack finds that it takes a personal twist when he learns that the terrorists may have connections to his estranged family.
Episodes.GuestStars: David Hunt,  Scott William Winters,  Paul McCrane,  Peter Smith,  Andrea Grano,  Matt Battaglia,  Missy Crider,  Mark Bramhall,  Ryan Cutrona,  Haaz Sleiman,  Al Faris,  Adrian Neil

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 11:00 A.M. - 12:00 P.M.
Episodes.Plot: Jack forces Graem to take him to McCarthy's office in the hopes of finding a lead to their father's whereabouts. Lennox plays a trump card that removes Karen from his path as he prepares to implement more extreme policies. The FBI's sting operation with Walid goes terribly awry, while Nadia finds herself impeded by new security measures at CTU.
Episodes.GuestStars: Scott William Winters,  David Hunt,  Steve Wastell,  Jim Klock,  Haaz Sleiman,  Al Faris,  Missy Crider,  Paul McCrane,  James Cromwell

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 12:00 P.M. - 1:00 P.M.
Episodes.Plot: Jack's family loyalties are put to the test as Graem reveals his full involvement in the terrorist activities. Wayne convenes a meeting of his cabinet to discuss Lennox's drastic policies, while Sandra tends to an injured Walid. Morris receives some bad news about a relative, and McCarthy sets a trap designed to capture the man who can help Fayed build a new trigger for the nukes.
Episodes.GuestStars: Robb Weller,  James C. Victor,  Martin A. Papazian,  Missy Crider,  David Hunt,  Paul McCrane,  James Cromwell

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 1:00 P.M. - 2:00 P.M.
Episodes.Plot: Jack tries to trace Morris's location, while Fayed uses harsh tactics to gain his cooperation. Lennox contemplates his resignation in the face of Wayne's rebuke, but Reed suggests an extreme course of action that may result in a change in leadership. Wayne meets with Assad and pressures him to publicly renounce terrorism.
Episodes.GuestStars: Lawton R. Metcalf,  Sam Younis,  Missy Crider,  James C. Victor,  Michael Reilly Burke,  David Hunt

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 2:00 P.M. - 3:00 P.M.
Episodes.Plot: Marilyn gives Jack a lead that will help him find Gredenko, but they hit a wall as Phillip takes steps to cover his tracks. As Lennox learns more about Reed's plan, the Vice-President pushes Wayne to reconsider his dialogue with Assad.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jolene Kim,  Brian Silverman,  Maury Sterling,  Natalija Nogulich,  Adrian Neil,  James Cromwell

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 3:00 P.M. - 4:00 P.M.
Episodes.Plot: Marilyn tells Jack the truth about his father's involvement in the day's conspiracy. Jack uses her in an attempt to get to Phillip. Chloe covers for Morris when he turns to an old vice after reaching the breaking point, while Milo finds himself over his head in fieldwork. Lennox takes a hard stand as Reed's deadly plan to shift presidential control moves forward.
Episodes.GuestStars: Gregory Itzin,  Lyn Alicia Henderson,  Matt McKenzie,  Will Radford,  James C. Victor,  Maury Sterling,  James Cromwell

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 4:00 P.M. - 5:00 P.M.
Episodes.Plot: Lennox tries desperately to escape from Reed as Wayne makes final preparations for his joint speech with Assad. Chloe continues to cover for Morris as Nadia becomes more suspicious. Jack meets with ex President Logan and learns that a lead to Gredenko's whereabouts may be located within the Russian consolate.
Episodes.GuestStars: Richard Rosser,  Jolene Kim,  Jamison Jones,  Evan Ellingson,  Ajay Mehta,  William Bumiller,  Rena Sofer,  Alexander Siddig,  Chad Lowe,  Michael Reilly Burke,  Gregory Itzin,  Nancy Cartwright,  Eddie Driscoll

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 5:00 P.M. - 6:00 P.M.
Episodes.Plot: Vice-President Daniels assumes office in the wake of Wayne's injury and makes plans to implement his extreme security agenda. Lennox names the co-conspirators in the attack, but finds himself under Daniels' thumb. Meanwhile, Karen moves to insert herself back in her former job. Jack and Logan pay a visit to the Russian consulate, but Jack takes drastic action when Logan fails to learn Gredenko's location.
Episodes.GuestStars: Chad Lowe,  Boris Krutonog,  John Noble,  Mark Joyella,  Endres Hules,  Jim Holmes,  William Bumiller,  Eugene Alper,  Andrea Grano,  John Brantley Cole Jr.,  Michael Reilly Burke,  Bob Gunton,  Nick Jameson

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 6:00 P.M. - 7:00 P.M.
Episodes.Plot: While Jack evades Russian security guards, Buchanan assigns a new agent, Mike Doyle, to raid the Russian consulate to capture Markov and rescue Jack.Logan calls on his estranged ex-wife in the hopes that she can help to defuse the brewing crisis between the U.S. and Russia.Gredenko prepares to strike at another target. Meanwhile, Daniels gives a Middle Eastern ambassador a strong ultimatum in order to gain his cooperation in the hunt for the remaining nukes.
Episodes.GuestStars: Lauten Richard Metcalfe,  James Ellis Lane,  Rick Schroder,  Boris Krutonog,  Ajay Mehta,  John Noble,  Kathleen Gati,  Gideon  Emery,  Scarlett Chorvat,  Adoni Maropis,  Nick Jameson,  Jean Smart

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 7:00 P.M. - 8:00 P.M.
Episodes.Plot: Jack learns a devastating piece of news about Audrey upon his return to CTU.As a desperate Gredenko launches his strike, CTU learns that their systems have been compromised by a mole who is obstructing their efforts to find the drone.Karen finds a possible ally in Lennox as Daniels proceeds on his extreme course that will pit the U.S. against the Middle East.
Episodes.GuestStars: Joseph Griffin,  Marci Michelle,  Butch Hammett,  James Horan,  Ryan Cutrona,  Jim Holmes,  Rena Sofer,  Rade Serbedzija,  Adoni Maropis,  Bob Gunton,  Rick Schroder

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 8:00 P.M. - 9:00 P.M.
Episodes.Plot: Jack and Doyle head up field ops while tracking Gredenko and Fayed, and the Vice President's decision sends shockwaves through his administration.
Episodes.GuestStars: Rick Schroder,  Francisco Viana,  K.T. Thangavelu,  J.R. Bourne,  Rade Serbedzija,  Jim Holmes,  Ryan Cutrona,  Devon Gummersall,  Scott Michael Campbell,  Lex Cassar,  Eric Cazenave,  Powers Boothe,  Adoni Maro

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 9:00 P.M. - 10:00 P.M.
Episodes.Plot:
Wayne risks his unstable health in order to fight Daniels for the presidency. Lennox and Karen call an uneasy truce in the face of the impending war.

Doyle coerces Nadia into helping him dig up dirt on Milo, while Jack uses Gredenko in a sting operation that will lead them to Fayed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Adoni Maropis,  Powers Boothe,  Ryan Cutrona,  Joseph Hacker,  Bob Morrisey,  Brenda Wehle,  Rade Serbedzija,  Jim Holmes,  Lex Cassar,  Said Faraj,  Jolene Kim,  Rick Schroder,  Anthony Michael Jones,  Ray Laska

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 10:00 P.M. - 11:00 P.M.
Episodes.Plot: Wayne continues to risk his health as he takes a stand that will force cooperation from the Middle East.Jack realizes he won't be able to break Fayed, so he and Doyle concoct a scheme to force Fayed to lead them to the location of the remaining nukes. But Fayed's ally engages in trickery that places the plan in jeopardy.
Episodes.GuestStars: Ajay Mehta, Said Faraj, Merik Tadros, Ismail Kanater

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 11:00 P.M. - 12:00 A.M.
Episodes.Plot: Cheng offers to exchange the nuclear component for Audrey's life. Jack gains Chloe's covert cooperation, but their plans are dashed when Morris stumbles on to the operation.Wayne gives Daniels an unpleasant ultimatum, but his fragile health soon tips the balance in the vice-president's favor.
Episodes.GuestStars: Mary Chris Wall, Mike Smith, Jim Holmes, William Bumiller, Matt McKenzie, Rueben Grundy

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 12:00 A.M. - 1:00 A.M.
Episodes.Plot: Jack sets up a meeting with Cheng, while Doyle tries to track him with CTU's help.Buchanan's career is placed in jeopardy when Karen is forced to make a damning choice to save the administration.Daniels seeks comfort from his assistant as he assumes the presidency.
Episodes.GuestStars: Terry Savage, Jonathan Adams, Andrea Grano, Chad Lowe

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 1:00 A.M. - 2:00 A.M.
Episodes.Plot: Nadia approves an interrogation technique that might prove fatal to Audrey. Doyle covertly aids Jack in the hopes that he can save her from further mental trauma.Daniels discovers that he may have a leak in his administration when he is confronted by the angry Russian president.Chloe and Morris's relationship hits the rocks, while Heller delivers Jack a stern warning.
Episodes.GuestStars: J.C. MacKenzie, Michael Shanks, Ray Proscia, Jayson Victor, John Brantley Cole Jr.

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 2:00 A.M. - 3:00 A.M.
Episodes.Plot: Jack is held in custody at CTU, while Cheng prepares to launch a surprise attack.Lennox uses Lisa as a plant to send a false message to the Russians in hopes of defusing a tense situation.Morris' decision to end his relationship with Chloe begins taking its toll on her as they struggle to maintain professionalism, and Josh shows signs of guilt over the role his father played in the day's terrorist attacks.
Episodes.GuestStars: Michael Shanks, Powers Boothe, Ron Yuan, Matt McKenzie, Ian Anthony Dale, Marci Michelle, Terry Savage

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 3:00 A.M. - 4:00 A.M.
Episodes.Plot: Jack runs a desperate tactic to free the CTU hostages from their captors. He manages to intercept Cheng, who plans to deliver Josh to his grandfather in exchange for the circuit board. Jack is forced to allow Cheng to escape in order to save Josh's life.Lennox continues to monitor Lisa as she plants evidence for Mark to deliver to the Russians. The situation takes a nasty turn when all does not go according to plan. Meanwhile, Daniels tries to run a bluff on the Russian president, but finds he's
Episodes.GuestStars: Ian Anthony Dale, Spencer Garrett, Matt McKenzie, Ron Yuan, James Cromwell, Kari Matchett, Michael Shanks, Powers Boothe

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 4:00 A.M. - 5:00 A.M.
Episodes.Plot: Doyle takes Josh to meet Phillip in the hopes of retrieving the circuit board, but his conscience bothers him over the exchange.Karen puts her career on the line when she uses Bill to help break Jack from custody. Jack and Bill track Phillip, but not before he pulls a fast move that reaps serious injury to Doyle.Nadia has a conversation with Milo's brother, while Chloe suffers from a mysterious medical problem that strikes her at the wrong moment.
Episodes.GuestStars: Lex Cassar, Marci Michelle, Rick Schroder, Powers Boothe, James Cromwell, Chris Kramer, Tzi Ma, James C. Victor

Episodes.Title: Day 6: 5:00 A.M. - 6:00 A.M.
Episodes.Plot: CTU discovers where Philip is hiding and Daniels orders an air strike in a desperate move to appease the Russians. Jack and Bill go after Josh alone before the bombers find their target.Lennox persuades Daniels to grant leniency for Bill and Karen. In the wake of the close call, Daniels begins to question his choices as acting president.Chloe gives Morris some surprising news that alters their relationship, while Marilyn is reunited with Josh at CTU.
Episodes.Writer: Robert Cochran, Manny Coto, David Fury
Episodes.GuestStars: Tom Everett, Rick Schroder, Lex Cassar, Marci Michelle, Christian Maccio, Bob Gunton, Tzi Ma

Episodes.Title: 24: Redemption
Episodes.Plot: Jack Bauer tries to prevent an African warlord from recruiting children for his militia.
